Owner Fine Art, Murals, Faux Finishes, Trompe L'oeil, Graphic Design and Photography

-Fine Art, Murals, Faux Finishes, Trompe L'oeil, Graphic Design and Photography-Graphic Design: Specialized in creating unique visual concepts using computer software and also by hand, to communicate ideas, inspire, inform and captivate consumers with brand-focus, creative  designs: advertisements, brochures, Logo Design for businesses, etc.-Art and Murals for your Home and Business and nonprofit organizations-Faux Finishes, Scrollwork, medallions and Home art d√©cor-Original Art and Children murals for your home and business-Original canvas art always made specially for you-Art Classes for children and adults: Expert in Art Education for students in K-12 and adult education, totaling more than 20 years of experience in the Art teaching field. Also  provides private Art lessons in her own studio or in the comfort of your home.-Body paint, face painting, and art painting parties: Special step by step teaching system.-Photographer: Headshots, corporate, family, business events, etc.

As a Studio Art Teacher in Great Hearts Ms.Thurbon teaches diverse media, styles, subjects and content with high quality expectations.Students work is informed and guided by observation, experimentation, discussion, critical analysis, Socratic Discussion, and reflection, thus relating individual practices to the arts. Students are asked to demonstrate conceptual and technical development and success. In Studio Art Scholars learn: Sketching, Drawing with and without value, Canons of Beauty, Still Life, Landscapes, Structures (perspective-Architectural), Observational drawing, Color theory, Utilizing different types of media, and techniques.
Executive Assistant to CEO & Marketing Coordinator

Reporting directly to the CEO, the Executive Assistant provides executive support in a one-on-one working relationship, organizes and coordinates executive outreach and external relations efforts and oversees special projects. The Executive Assistant will also support Human Resources and help with General office administration. As a Marketing Coordinator must create, develop and implement company literature, campaigns, and maintain promotional materials inventory. Plan, coordinate and execute internal and external events, and create, research and post for AccountabilIT in multiple platforms and Social Media. As CEO Assistant: Completes a broad variety of administrative tasks: managing calendar of appointments, arranging travel plans, itineraries, and agendas; and compiling documents, and  taking notes in meetings. Help to plan, coordinate and ensure the CEO's schedule is followed and respected. Works closely and effectively with the CEO to keep him/her well informed of upcoming commitments and responsibilities, following up appropriately. Prioritizes needs; handles matters expeditiously, proactively, and follows-through on projects to successful completion.As Manager and Marketing Coordinator: Support Human Resources and help with General office administration such as reception, copying, filing, mail. Create documents, such as literature, campaigns, Power Point Presentations, collaterals, etc. Develop and implementing marketing and advertising campaigns through Social Media having strategies. Post to all Company Social Media Sites keeping them active, and monitored. Create promotional materials such as logos, illustrations, and designs in Creative Suite InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Word Press, etc. Promotes following, posting, liking, hash-tagging, etc.all media platforms. Plans meetings, events, shows etc. by assembling, and coordinating requirements; establishing contacts; developing schedules and assignments. Photographer for Headshots, events, etc.

Ms. Thurbon is an extraordinarily talented artist. The murals she painted for the foyer of our school are exquisite, and they are conversation pieces for virtually every guest to the campus. So striking was her work, the Network Lead Office contracted her to do work for their spaces as well. Her artistic projects have significantly enhanced the beauty and sophistication of our campus. I commend her without reservation.

summary: ‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ About Laura Laura Thurbon is both a fine artist as well as a rounded and seasoned art educator.        ‚ûΩ Her primary studies were in Lima, Peru graduating as an Art Teacher, and Professional Artist        after 8 years of intense instruction at the National Fine Arts School of Lima. ‚ñÅ ‚ñÇ ‚ñÉ Laura has won many art awards, has participated in numerous Collective and Individual exhibitions, and her artwork is part of several collections around the world in:    ‚û°United States    ‚û°South America    ‚û° Europe    ‚û° Israel    ‚û°India Laura has taught Art for more than 9 years in Several Elementary, Middle & High Schools and Colleges in Peru and the U.S.‚úî     14 years as a small business owner: www.LauraThurbon.com‚úî     16 years as an art middle school and college educator ‚úî     21 years as a professional artist, event coordinator and public relations
